skills.title: Front-End
skills.description: Front-end developers use HTML, CSS, and JavaScript to design and implement the visual elements that users interact with directly in their browsers.

skills.title: UI & UX Design
skills.description: UI designers focus on the look and feel, using elements like colors, typography, and imagery to enhance the user experience.

skills.title: Webflow Development
skills.description: Web flow development typically refers to the process of creating and building websites or web applications using visual development platforms.
